question:
Which of the following statements are correct with respect to religious policy of Sikander Lodhi?
1. He sacked the Hindu temples and built mosques in their places.
2. He issued orders forbidding the Hindus to bathe at the ghats of the Jamuna.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Sikander Lodhi sacked the Hindu temples and built mosques in their places. He also issued orders which forbid the Hindus to bathe at the ghats of the Jamuna. He was religious bigot.
